title: Restless Axe (4R55)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Regroup: Exert a Dwarf to shuffle a [Dwarven] condition (and all cards stacked on it) into your draw deck. Exert a minion for each card shuffled into your draw deck.
Lore:	”'Give me a row of orc-necks and room to swing and all weariness will fall from me!'”
Rarity:	R
